titleStmt.title: The Christianity of the people commonly called Quakers, asserted. Being a brief account of their faith in relation to divers matters where-in their Christian belief is questioned. Published in behalf of the people of God called Quakers by some of them.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by cataloger.
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1771 as Wing (2nd ed.) W1915.
Cf. Wing (2nd ed.) W1915, which implies "Quakers, vindicated" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
